requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 5500 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
